name: tech_reviewer_outreach
description: Create outreach message for tech reviewer
user_message: Write an outreach message to @techreviewer (Tech YouTuber, 500K subscribers) for a product review of our new smartphone. Tone should be professional but friendly. Key points: early access, honest review, creative freedom.

name: fashion_influencer_outreach
description: Create outreach message for fashion influencer
user_message: Draft an outreach message to @fashionista (Fashion Instagram Influencer, 200K followers) for sponsored posts about our sustainable clothing brand. Casual and approachable tone. Focus on sustainability and long-term partnership.

name: fitness_creator_outreach
description: Create outreach message for fitness creator
user_message: Create outreach for @fitnessguru (Fitness Content Creator, 150K followers) for brand ambassadorship of our fitness app. Motivational and authentic tone. Emphasize authentic partnership and user testimonials.

name: send_first_email_happy_path
description: Tests the complete happy path: user provides all info, agent confirms, user approves, and email is sent via tool.
user_message: I want to send an email to John Doe at john.doe@example.com. The campaign is for a product review of a new gaming keyboard, budget is $1000, platform is YouTube. Please confirm and send.

name: missing_creator_email
description: Tests agent's ability to identify and request missing creator email when only name and campaign are provided.
user_message: Send an email to Jane Smith for the fashion brand collaboration. The campaign is for 3 Instagram posts promoting sustainable clothing, budget $750.

name: missing_campaign_brief_details
description: Tests agent's ability to identify and request more campaign details when a creator is provided but the campaign brief is vague.
user_message: I want to send an email to @influencer_x (influencer.x@mail.com). It's for a collaboration opportunity.

name: user_declines_sending_after_confirmation
description: Tests agent's ability to cancel the sending process if the user explicitly declines after initial confirmation.
user_message: No, actually, don't send it yet. I need to review the campaign brief first.

session_context.last_agent_message: I have all the details for John Doe (john.doe@example.com) for the gaming keyboard review campaign ($1000 budget). Do you approve sending this outreach email?

name: attempt_to_send_to_multiple_creators
description: Tests the 'one email at a time' rule, ensuring the agent refuses group emails and explains the policy.
user_message: Send emails to creator1@mail.com (Alice) and creator2@mail.com (Bob) for the new app promotion. Campaign is for 2 stories each, $500 per creator.

name: correct_info_before_sending
description: Tests agent's ability to process corrections to campaign details from the user before the email is sent.
user_message: Actually, it's not a product review, it's for an *unboxing video*.

session_context.last_agent_message: So you want to send to John Doe at john.doe@example.com for a product review campaign with a budget of $1000? Please confirm.

name: query_campaign_details_during_waiting_period
description: Tests agent's ability to provide campaign details when asked during the waiting period after an email has been sent.
user_message: What was the budget we offered for that campaign again for Sarah Connor?

session_context.last_agent_message: Great! The outreach email to Sarah Connor (sarah.connor@example.com) for the fitness app promotion has been sent. I'll notify you when she responds. While you wait, you can review the campaign details.

sent_email_details.campaign_description: Fitness app promotion, Instagram stories, 3 posts, goal app downloads.

name: attempt_to_modify_offer_during_waiting_period
description: Tests agent's enforcement of the rule that offers cannot be modified after an email has been sent, requiring new outreach.
user_message: Can we increase the budget to $1500 for John Doe's campaign? I just realized we have more funds.

session_context.last_agent_message: Great! The outreach email to John Doe (john.doe@example.com) for the gaming keyboard review has been sent. I'll notify you when he responds. While you wait, you can review the campaign details.

sent_email_details.campaign_description: Product review of new gaming keyboard.

name: malformed_creator_email
description: Tests agent's ability to detect and request correction for a malformed email address.
user_message: Send an email to Alice Wonderland at alice@wonderland for the beauty product launch. Campaign brief: 2 TikTok videos, $600 budget, goal brand awareness.

name: no_budget_in_campaign_brief
description: Tests agent's handling of a campaign brief where the budget is explicitly stated as 'open to proposals' or not yet set, proceeding with confirmation.
user_message: I want to send an email to Emily White (emily.white@example.com) for a new travel app promotion. The campaign is for Instagram reels, 1 post. Goal is app downloads. No specific budget set yet, we're open to proposals.
